title: My suspension
body: Riot can you please send me the details on why I banned to the email I provide HarderorSofter@gmail.com because you guys already know the email my account was changed without consent and instead of helping me change it because it was made by my brother for me so we could comply to the terms of conditions to make the account you guys ban instead so can you pls send me  the details

replies.body:
Hey Painted Ash,

If you're looking for more context regarding a suspension, your best bet is to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you have any questions, let me know!
